meta.title: From EXPLOSIONS to SKY
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: [This week](/2025/04/01), I'm building Raddles around acts we saw at Big Ears. Explosions in the Sky ended the whole festival with an absolutely face-melting barnstorm of a set. Been a fan for a long time, so it was a treat to finally see them live. [Listen on Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/album/2BkhGv48TtChjKBwkC67eo?si=GjP6igNqTmmfert_w9JmlQ)

ladder.clue: ^ are produced via this (especially in cartoons)
Add a letter to ^ to get the acronym of this cartoon team

ladder.transform: is a member of the The Three

ladder.clue: Swap the two parts of ^ then drop two consecutive letters to get an animal
